summary: An ordinance establishing, modifying and abrogating certain positions in the Park, Executive, Health, Engineering, Police and Lighting Depts. and in the office of the City Treasurer and in the Division of Purchasing; fixing compensations; superseding the 1960 Salary Ordinance (88800) insofar as in conflict and providing funds by appropriation, budget item transfers, and a partially reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor.
